data.comment: The match is underway at Erve Asito.
Goal! Said Bakari gives Waalwijk a 0-1 lead in Almelo.
In the minute 26, Cyril Ngonge instrumental with a fine assist.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Almelo.
Rai Vloet (Almelo) has missed a penalty!
In the minute 42, Sylla Sow (Waalwijk) has received a yellow card from Jannick van der Laan.
Jannick van der Laan blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 50, Frank Wormuth (Almelo) is making a first substitution, with Tim Breukers replacing Noah Fadiga.
The away team have replaced Cyril Ngonge with Morad el Haddouti. This is the first substitution made today by Fred Grim.
Robin Propper (Almelo) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 67, The home team replace Rai Vloet with Adrian Szoke.
Ola John is replacing Vitalie Damascan for the away team.
Richard van der Venne is replacing Sylla Sow for Waalwijk at Erve Asito.
In the minute 86, Almelo make their third substitution with Luca de la Torre replacing Sinan Bakis.
Kasper Lunding is on a sub for Silvester Van der Water for Almelo.
Frank Wormuth is making the team's fifth substitution at Erve Asito with Jeremy Cijntje replacing Delano Burgzorg.
In the minute 87, The away team replace Anas Tahiri with Ayman Azhil.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-1.
